Interface CubesRedistributionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbandonedStation, Planets, Smugglers
public interface CubesRedistributionHandler

  • Method Details

    • validateStorageUpdates

      default void validateStorageUpdates(Map<Coordinates,List<CargoCube>> storageUpdates, GameModel gameModel)
      Validates the storage updates provided by checking their compliance with the game rules and constraints.
      Parameters:
      storageUpdates - a map where the keys are the coordinates of the storages to be updated, and the values are lists of CargoCubes to be placed in the corresponding storages
      gameModel - the current state of the game, containing information about the player, their ship, and storages
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the following conditions are met: - No storage is found at the specified coordinates. - RED CargoCubes are attempted to be placed in a storage that is not of type SpecialStorage. - The number of cubes exceeds the maximum capacity of the specified storage. - The coordinates provided are outside of the valid shipboard matrix bounds. - The specified coordinates do not point to a storage component on the shipboard.

    • applyStorageUpdates

      default void applyStorageUpdates(Map<Coordinates,List<CargoCube>> storageUpdates, GameModel gameModel)
      Applies the updates to the storages. Updates the storages on a player's ship board with the provided storage updates. The existing cargo cubes in each affected storage are cleared and replaced with new cubes as specified in the storageUpdates map.
      Parameters:
      storageUpdates - map of updates to be applied
      gameModel - the current game model
      storageUpdates - a map where each key represents the coordinates of a storage, and the value is a list of CargoCube objects to be added to that storage
      gameModel - the current game model containing the player's ship board and game state
